definitions.text: an event that occurs at a critical time
examples: at such junctures he always had an impulse to leave
it was needed only on special occasions
the party was quite an affair
an occasion arranged to honor the president
a seemingly endless round of social functions
there was no occasion for complaint

definitions.text: the time of a particular event
examples: on the occasion of his 60th birthday
there was never an occasion for her to demonstrate her skill
